PawnColumnDef.label: reserve
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: Target minimum amount of soul energy to keep in inventory.

PawnColumnDef.label: quality
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: Maximum quality of filled soul gems to keep in inventory.

PawnColumnDef.label: empty
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: Target number of empty soul gems of each kind to keep in inventory.

PawnColumnDef.label: soul gems
PawnColumnDef.headerTip: Filled soul gems carried in inventory. Click to store or mark as unusable.
